content: keep your pup warm comfy and ridiculously cute with this raglan-style dog sweater crochet pattern designed for a classic pullover fit with clean lines and minimal seaming this sweater is as enjoyable to make as it is for your dog to wear pattern details skill level easy / advanced beginner construction top-down raglan seamless pullover materials worsted weight yarn and a 4 5mm crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge sizes included xxs xs s m l xl 2xl fit comfortable flexible fit for a wide range of dog breeds stitch pattern simple and beginner-friendly with a beautiful textured look
